title: Why do music files on my google pixel get random 'last modified' dates?
content: I recently got myself a google pixel and so far the experience was really good. But lately in my music player I noticed that my music files change their last modified dates. Event though I don't modify the files and the player app that I am using also was working fine on previous phones. How can I solve this issue and why would the phones OS do this to the files?
